betterquesting:10.desc:8:
When the monthly donation goal is reached, then this quest will be auto-completed and the reward quests will open up.

The monthly goal is set-up so that we can help Stone offset the monthly costs of running the server (electricity and Internet access). It is not used for lattes and vacations.

For more info visit the #gtnh-2025 channel on our Discord [url]https://discord.gg/kBTabCX[/url] and check the pinned message about Donations.
